text: Hamile tapar'imbhanda agadi pani dherai sandestaharu (paigambaraharu) pathayaum. Uniharumadhye ta kehika vrttanta hamile tapar'inla'i varnana garidi'eka chaum ra kehi yasta chan jasaka vrttanta ta hamile tapar'inla'i varnana gareka chainaum ra kunai rasulako pani yo samathrya thi'ena ki allahako adesa bina kunai nisani lya'os. Ani jaba allahako adesa a'ipugnecha ta n'yayapurna nirnaya garihaline cha. Yaham jhuthaharu ghatama parihalne chan.â€™â€™
